log-subtitle: What's new about each version of Koodo Reader
fix1-1-0-7: Fix the bug causing blank screen after importing backup file
fix2-1-0-7: Delete extra testing code from source code
fix3-1-0-7: Remove the padding setting from setting panel
new1-1-0-7: Refactor the whole project with TypeScript
new2-1-0-7: The orignal JavaScript code is kept in JavaScript branch
fix1-1-0-8: Change svg logo to png logo
fix2-1-0-8: Fix the bug showing highlighter in every chapter
new1-1-0-8: Add English support for non-Chinese system
new2-1-0-8: Drag epub file on Import-From-Local button to add books
fix1-1-0-9: Fix the bug causing font-size switch failure
fix3-1-0-9: Fix the bug causing setting panel to exit unusually
new1-1-0-9: refact the code to increase readability
new2-1-0-9: Set Source Sans Pro as the default font
new1-1-1-0: Add support to Dropbox, Now you can sync data from multiple devices
new2-1-1-0: Now you can delete notes, bookmarks, digests and highlighters as you want
new3-1-1-0: Now you can add multiple epubs simultaneously
fix1-1-1-1: Make the icon and text of card-mode and list-mode align center
fix2-1-1-1: Fix the fullscreen issue after pressing Esc button
fix3-1-1-1: Fix the render issue of delete icon
new1-1-1-2: Now you can choose the color for highlighter
new2-1-1-2: Notes and digests can be redirect to its position in  books
new4-1-1-2: Now you can preview the image in books
new5-1-1-2: notes can be edited and added to digests, notes and digests will both be highlighted in books
new8-1-1-2: Books recently added or read will be shown first in All Books
new9-1-1-2: Now you can sync your data with OneDrive
fix1-1-1-3: Fix the position issue for notes, bookmarks and digest
fix2-1-1-3: Fix the bookmark issue causing app crash
fix3-1-1-3: Fix the NaN issue in progress panel
fix5-1-1-3: Fix the flash issue after import failure
new1-1-1-3: Now you can add a heart icon to your favorite books
new2-1-1-3: A bookmark logo will show up after adding
fix1-1-1-4: Fix the bug causing image displayed in two pages
fix2-1-1-4: Fix the batch-import issue when repeated books included
new1-1-1-4: Now you search in the book
new4-1-1-4: Support for built-in css of epub
new5-1-1-4: Now you can adjust font size to any value
fix1-1-1-5: 修复滚动模式下的一些bug
fix2-1-1-5: 修复备份恢复时的崩溃问题
fix3-1-1-5: 客户端启动时的性能优化
new2-1-1-5: 增加对触控屏的支持，请前往设置->开启触控模式，阅读时双击页面唤出菜单，再双击退出，上下左右滑动控制翻页
new4-1-1-5: 支持给笔记和书摘添加标签
new7-1-1-5: 支持自动打开上次阅读的图书，请前往设置->自动打开上次阅读的图书
new8-1-1-5: 支持控制是否使用内嵌字体，请前往设置->使用内嵌字体
